pname,

mapper.update:
update project
pname = #{pname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
comname = #{comname,jdbcType=INTEGER},
emp_fk1 = #{empFk1,jdbcType=INTEGER},
empcount = #{empcount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
starttime = #{starttime,jdbcType=DATE},
buildtime = #{buildtime,jdbcType=DATE},
cost = #{cost,jdbcType=INTEGER},
level = #{level,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
endtime = #{endtime,jdbcType=DATE},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
emp_fk = #{empFk,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where pid = #{pid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update project set pname = #{pname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, comname = #{comname,jdbcType=INTEGER}, emp_fk1 = #{empFk1,jdbcType=INTEGER}, empcount = #{empcount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, starttime = #{starttime,jdbcType=DATE}, buildtime = #{buildtime,jdbcType=DATE}, cost = #{cost,jdbcType=INTEGER}, level = #{level,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, endtime = #{endtime,jdbcType=DATE}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, emp_fk = #{empFk,jdbcType=INTEGER} where pid = #{pid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select from project where pid not in (select id from analysis)
select from project where pid in (select id from analysis)
select from project where pid in (select analysis_fk from module)
select from project where pid in (select analysis_fk from module where id in (select modele_fk from function1 where id not in (select fun_fk from task)))
